title: (x) Gucci logo - custom designed {Mike Y}
content:
And where it’s available from?  
I’m sure this question has been asked and answered 100 times by now but I can’t use the search feature and I need to know asap.  
thanx

 [‹ (x) New York Magazine typeface - Elderkin {Mark S}](http://web.archive.org/web/20081025051915/http:/typophile.com/node/12397 "Go to previous forum topic") [Lanson logo - script font ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20081025051915/http:/typophile.com/node/12487 "Go to next forum topic")
author: emisis

comments.content:
We have had that question many times, and the answer was that it was custom designed. Not available, in other words.

Sorry.

I was afraid you’d say that, just had an inkling,  
but thanks anyway!
It is requested so frequently it’s even ID’d in the FAQ.

Here’s one of many threads on the subject, dating back to 2002. :)

[http://www.typophile.com/forums/messages/83/1364.html?1032016045](http://web.archive.org/web/20081025051915/http:/www.typophile.com/forums/messages/83/1364.html?1032016045 "http://www.typophile.com/forums/messages/83/1364.html?1032016045")
Version 2 all you want, but still nobody reads the FAQ. Why do I even bother... :-/
